text: hi guys it's mom I hope you get this
message I love you very very very much
and I miss you
each and every day that were apart this
rock is strong and will be strong for
you moment and then he gave it to me so
I won't forget I just want him to know
that I love him when I'm fighting for
him and I won't ever stop fighting for
him and I will always be his mom these
three moms have all had the children
taken to Lebanon they all say their
children were abducted by the children's
fathers two of the fathers have Interpol
red notices against their names and one
father is wanted by the FBI
for suspected parental abduction all
three fathers shared joint custody of
the children at the time they were taken
all three are now facing criminal
charges outside of Lebanon I traveled
from Lebanon where I'm based to meet
each mum and hear their stories
[Music]
the week that they went away with their
dad and I thought they were coming back
I had done his laundry and it reminds me
of the last time that they were home he
picked them up on the 24th from the
house here I said see you know we can
have a great vacation with dad and what
had happened is for some did pick up the
kids on the 24th and did go to Seattle
that day but on the 25th him and the
children boarded a plane from Seattle to
Paris and then on to Beirut after he
took the kids to there he he got custody
of the children through the Sunni
religious court the man that I dated was
different than the one that I married
grocery shopping is like not a thing I
can do normally without breaking down
because I see things that my kids used
to like to buy I have about one phone
call a week I love you so so so true to
distance as much it's like bittersweet
because they're not actually here and I
can't actually physically hug them and
hold them and kiss them I never ever
thought that he would take away the most
valuable things in my life which are my
kids he is supposed to protect his wife
and his family and no reason to doubt
that my kids were not coming back
after the birth of our son we were very
happy very excited and then a few months
later things just started to go south
Dexter we need to get out of class he
would come and sit on these pretend to
ride the horse he'd run through this
little gate excited to see me I find
myself even just crying on my kitchen
floor and the millinery screaming you
just in disbelief that this is actually
happening so why haven't these men been
arrested and the children returned home
a parent may never be guilty of
abducting his old child this is how it
is conceived and then Banias law Lebanon
doesn't recognize child abduction by
parent as far as the Lebanese courts are
concerned the crime just doesn't exist
for the first five days that the police
were investigating all of their trails
got lost in Paris so I was crossing my
fingers and hoping he had gone there
because France belongs to the hague
conventions i asked was some if you'd
like to talk to the BBC but he declined
to speak i wish he would just come back
with the kids and we could pretend like
it didn't happen
Jolley hadn't seen her children for two
and a half years and out of desperation
went to Lebanon herself in 2018 to try
and get her children but because the
father had placed a travel ban on the
children in Lebanon she tried to smuggle
them out through Syria they were caught
by a militia and handed to the syrian
authorities the children will return to
their father and jolly were sent back to
Canada so I got blamed by a lot of the
people for doing what I did
and he got applauded for doing what he
did basically I contacted the father and
he told me that we have one family and I
no longer want to talk about this and
that jolly is not prevented from seeing
the children FBI came to my house and
they confirmed that the father and
Dexter had in fact traveled from Tampa
to Lana to Rome to Beirut despite
Rochelle having placed a travel ban on
Dexter in the US the father managed to
fly to Lebanon with Dexter
the FBI states that the child traveled
with a fraudulently obtained passport I
asked the father Ali for an interview
even though these men are facing
criminal charges in Canada in the US
Lebanon is not party to the Hague
Convention on the civil aspects of
international child abduction some
believe that it's because it would upset
the religious court system the problem
here is that some individuals will hide
behind the fact that we have religious
legislations here and there is just
jurisdiction I don't really see the link
between signing the Hague Convention and
respecting individual belief the link is
not here Canada Lebanon do have a
bilateral agreement regarding child
abduction but so far that hasn't helped
get Shelly Anjali's children back
Lebanon is a member of Interpol
but again the incident needs to be
considered a crime locally for law to be
enforced but if the fathers leave the
country they could be arrested I asked
the Deputy Prime Minister mr. Hassan has
Bernie what he thought of the mother's
predicaments this is an unfortunate and
an unfair situation many people in
Lebanon are working on modifying the
legal structure so we do recognize
international rulings when it comes to
criminal acts in other countries
[Music]
Shelly Rachelle and Charlie call
themselves the warrior mums they support
each other despite having never met
there are other moms in the group
fighting to get their children home and
they support dads too who are going
through a similar situation Justin
Trudeau who is the Prime Minister of
Canada is aware of my case he needs to
speak to the president of Lebanon and
take action to bring those kids back to
Canada everyone is trying to put
pressure on the Lebanese government to
get Dexter home but not only dr. rivela
the other children and Lebanon countries
have to come together and deal with it
because we know that we have a lot of
issues in raising our children
separating them from a parent makes
those issues of law Wars
